hadiths.text: It was narrated from Zaid bin Khalid Al-Juhani that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“Whoever gives food for a fasting person to break his fast, he will have a reward like theirs, without that detracting from their reward in the slightest.”

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي ثَوَابِ مَنْ فَطَّرَ صَائِمًا
chapter.eng-name: Concerning the reward of the one who gives food for a fasting person to break his fast
